text: The 1954 Asian Games, officially known as the II Asian Games, was a sports event in Manila, Philippines. It occurred from May 1 to May 9, 1954. There were 77 events from 8 sports and disciplines. ==References== Category:Asian Games by year Category:20th century in the Philippines Category:1954 in Asia Category:1954 in sports Category:Sport in the Philippines Category:Manila
title: 1954 Asian Games
